title: The In-Betweener
description: Two years ago a new medical nanite advance divided humanity into three types: humans, deaders and the frightening in-betweeners that crave human flesh. Emily's world has grown quiet and ordered, her days bounded by mornings killing deaders at her fence, and nights huddled alone in a warehouse office. She's begun to believe life will always be this way, alone with the dead or fighting in-betweeners for her life. But even that life is better than the alternative.Everything changes when one of the deaders at the gate isn't a deader at all. Heâ€™s an in-betweener different from any Emily has seen before...and he has a message. The In-Betweener is book one of the Between Life and Death series. The Between Life and Death series is suitable for ages 16 and up, with occasional violence and mild language.
author: Ann Christy
